_explanation.purpose: Design phase - refines domain concepts with OOP design patterns, object responsibilities, and technical implementation details
_explanation.scope: ONLY refines domain_concepts with detailed object responsibilities, collaborations, and design patterns. Does NOT modify story structure
_explanation.design_patterns: Add object responsibilities showing encapsulation, delegation, dependency injection, and factory patterns
_explanation.structure: Each domain concept has: name, module (source folder path), inherits_from (optional base class), responsibilities (with collaborators showing dependencies), instantiation details, and ownership patterns
_explanation.module_field: REQUIRED - Preserve module field from domain phase and verify accuracy (see preserve_module_from_domain rule for details)
_explanation.inherits_from_field: OPTIONAL - When a class inherits from a base class, include inherits_from field with base class name. Preserve from domain phase if present
